original_text: The priest is to examine them, and if the sores have turned white, the priest shall pronounce the affected person clean; then they will be clean.
korean_text: 제사장은 그를 진찰하여서 그 환부가 희어졌으면 환자를 정하다 할지니 그는 정하니라

sentences.original_text: The priest is to examine them
and if the sores have turned white
the priest shall pronounce the affected person clean
